DOC.brief_summary: Open label study to evaluate the efficacy of CURE-EX device in the treatment of onychomycosis.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of the Efficacy of CURE-EX Treatment in Onychomycosis
DOC.detailed_description: Each affected nail will be treated twice daily for 24-30 weeks. Efficacy will be evaluated by measuring the growth of healthy nail.
DOC.criteria: 1. Subjects diagnosed with clinical and mycological onychomycosis (by culture and smear). 2. Subjects did not receive topical antifungal treatment during the 14 days prior to commencing the study. 3. Subjects did not receive any systemic antifungal treatment during the 3 months prior to the start of the study. 1. lunula infected with onychomycosis. 2. Pregnant or breast feeding female.
